short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Active Apply saves time on job applications by seemlessly tracking where you apply, making your job search efficient and organized.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Active Apply is a powerful Chrome extension designed to revolutionize your job search. With Active Apply, you can easily keep track of all your job applications in one place, ensuring you never miss a follow-up or deadline. The extension automatically fills in job application forms with the job information, saving you valuable time and reducing the repetitive task of manually entering details for each application. 

If you're tired of constantly switching tabs and manually entering job application details into an Excel sheet, or if you want an effortless way to track where you've applied and see the status of each application—whether it's applied, interviewing, accepted, or rejected—then this extension is perfect for you!

Why install Active Apply?

- Efficiency: Speed up your job search by auto-filling job application tracking form, allowing you to apply to more positions in less time.
- Organization: Keep track of where and when you've applied, and stay on top of deadlines and follow-ups with a clear and organized spreadsheet.
- Convenience: Simplify the job application process with a user-friendly interface and easy setup.
- Productivity: Focus on finding the right job rather than spending hours on repetitive data entry.

Install Active Apply today and transform your job search into a more efficient, organized, and hassle-free experience!
